request.description:
Get user settings (notification preferences and platform settings)
Returns default values if user has no saved preferences
Update user settings (notification preferences and/or platform settings)
Admin home endpoint - returns admin dashboard information
Student home endpoint - returns basic student information
Teacher home endpoint - returns basic teacher information

exec: // This script runs before every request in the collection
// Check if token exists and is not expired
console.log('  No access token found. Please login first.');
console.log('  Access token has expired. Please login again.');
// This script runs after every response in the collection
// Check for access_token in response root
console.log(' Access token saved to environment');
console.log(' Token expiry set to 24 hours from now');
// Check for access_token in nested data object
console.log(' Access token saved from data field');
console.log(' User ID saved to environment');
console.log(' User ID saved from data field');
// Response is not JSON or doesn't contain expected fields
